pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Qi4 xiang4 Zu3 zhi1

definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

sentences.english: The WMO's final figure is an average of the three sets of data.
sentences.chinese: 世界气象组织的最终数据是这三组数据的平均值。
联合国世界气象组织成立。

sentences.english: The World Meteorological Organization started naming hurricanes in 1953.
sentences.chinese: 世界气象组织从1953年开始命名飓风。

sentences.english: The World Meteorological Organization agrees with this assessment.
sentences.chinese: 世界气象组织对这一评估表示认同。
